name: White Tiles - Piano Games
description: New version of White Tiles is now online!More cool skinsMore popular songsMore exciting gameplayLet the music jump with your fingertips!Follow the rhythm of the music and click on the black tiles. Be careful not to miss any of the black tiles.The game is over if you miss the black tile three times.Concentrate, the speed will gradually increase after the game starts, and the number of black tiles will also increase. Can you quickly react and pass the level perfectly?
